episode.title: Welcome to ByteCast: How to Use This + Why It Matters

content.summary_short: A fast, hype-driven welcome: what ByteCast is, how to use the player + slides + quests, and how to join the mission without drama.
content.summary_long: Episode 1 is a lightweight onboarding primer. It teaches the ByteCast flow (listen → slide → engage), sets expectations for contributors, and builds anticipation for upcoming drops. It includes a simple quest checklist and a mini-quiz checkpoint designed to reinforce the core idea: we ship reusable experiences fast, measure what works, and scale the winners.

aerovista_about.summary: AeroVista is a multi-division creative + engineering ecosystem shipping reusable experiences that blend software, storytelling, automation, music, and design.

divisions.name: NeXuS TechWorks
divisions.bread_and_butter: Full-stack engineering, offline-first apps, automation pipelines, DevOps, security hardening.

divisions.name: EchoVerse Audio
